title: The reason high finance needs more women: Research shows gender diverse teams are better at critical thinking. - Times of India
content: The reason high finance needs more women: Research shows gender diverse teams are better at critical thinking.  Times of India
description: The Financial Crisis of 2008 – a seismic event whose aftershocks we continue to experience – was widely believed to be a black swan event (even though it was perhaps actually a grey rhino) and...
